user_profile.name: Omar Al-Mansour

He possesses a keen eye for detail and prefers direct communication, particularly under high social pressure. Omar needs to book a nurse for his father urgently, leveraging his intuitive decision-making style despite feeling slightly overwhelmed due to his lack of previous experience in such matters.
